data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Sanma, Vanuatu to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Sanma, Vanuatu
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 17,733 believers in Sanma.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me

data.section_summary: On average, 5 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Sanma, Vanuatu.
data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to these new families.
Jesus, defend your people in the state of Sanma against the difficulty of these last days.
data.verse: But mark this: There will be terrible times in the last days. 2 People will be lovers of themselves, lovers of money, boastful, proud, abusive, disobedient to their parents, ungrateful, unholy, 3 without love, unforgiving, slanderous, without self-control, brutal, not lovers of the good, 4 treacherous, rash, conceited, lovers of pleasure rather than lovers of God— 5 having a form of godliness but denying its power.

data.prayer: Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the state of Sanma.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the fearful in Sanma, Vanuatu to submit to God and resist the devil.
data.verse: Submit yourselves, then, to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.

data.prayer: Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Sanma.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.section_summary:
the state of Sanma, Vanuatu has a population of 42,900.

We estimate Sanma has 17,733 people who might know Jesus, 21,341 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 3,825 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 2 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Sanma, Vanuatu.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."
